https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zNptgCoHeGItX784u21oIuKqkpw.jpg This short film tells the story of an ordinary day in Mike's life: He has an exciting job and a wonderful girlfriend but all he can think about is Daisy - his adorable pug. Daisy
